title: Interpretation of seeing wind in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing air through the vision website roy2a.com, air is a group of gases that make up the Earth’s atmosphere and that make life possible on the surface of the Earth, and seeing the wind in a dream can have different images in the dreamer’s dream. Sometimes a person sees strong winds, gusts of wind, hot air and other dreams that have meaning in real life. Therefore, we will present in this topic the most important interpretations provided by the great commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing wind in a dream. Seeing cold air in a dream indicates a beautiful breeze in the comfort, security, calm and confidence that the viewer feels. To see a strong and cold wind indicates a need. The viewer seeks kindness and safety, and his psychological need for many important feelings and comfort. Seeing hot air in a dream hitting the dreamer is a sign of a state of tension, nervousness, and a charged atmosphere around him. Seeing warm air while sitting with people, friends, or family, this indicates that there are differences between them. As for seeing What does warm air mean? Feeling confident in a dream and not being disturbed indicates stability in life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a kite in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wind in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that you see a strong wind in a dream. The dreamer follows him strongly, indicating the reason for his position and assumptions. Vision. Yourself walking on air in a dream refers to the material sustenance that the dreamer will obtain soon. Seeing falling in the air in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to obtain wishes and dreams that he wishes to fulfill but cannot obtain. Seeing the breezes and happiness that the viewer feels in a dream is a sign of wealth and goodness. And the happy news coming to him. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing gunfire in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wind in a dream for a single woman. Seeing cold wind in a girl’s dream is a sign of her good nature, calmness of nerves and the luxurious life she enjoys. Seeing the sensation of gases. The suggestion in a girl’s dream that she is happy with her life and has a good relationship with her peers. And her family. Seeing hot air in a dream means that the girl is suffering from problems that make her angry and obstacles that affect her psyche. Seeing hot air blowing once on the girl indicates in her dream that she will face problems soon or something unpleasant will appear. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a stewardess in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Wind in a dream for a married woman. Seeing cold air in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her life at home and with her family, especially if the air breezes enter her home. Seeing hot air for a married woman indicates disagreements between her and her husband or a member of her family. The beautiful breeze blows air that makes the married woman happy. In a dream, it is a sign of the happy news that you will hear soon and the good things that will come to her. Interpretation of seeing wind in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing cold wind in a dream for a pregnant woman is an indication of

title: The most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin about seeing intercourse in a dream

preview.html: Interpretations of seeing intercourse in a dream: Intimacy is a private matter for a person and his wife, and it is the rule of life, and sometimes some people dream of getting married in a dream with their wives, relatives, strangers, or even their mahrams. If he is otherwise married, then it is bad. These interpretations - even if there is some truth in them - are merely personal opinions without sources or references. Dream of intercourse: If you see a person having sex with another woman, this means that the person having sex - the man - will get a lot of money. Of the goodness of the person who has sex with him - the woman. Marriage of relatives in a dream Despite the negative expectations and the spread of fear, some consider it a warning not to fall into such disobedience, its legal interpretation by Imam Ibn Sirin is the abundant goodness that both of them enjoy and indicates the extent of their trust and the strength of their relationship. If a pregnant woman sees her husband having sexual intercourse with her from the anus, this may indicate many of the pains associated with labor that she will suffer from. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband is having intercourse with her while he is in a state of satisfaction and ecstasy, this indicates that the birth period will pass calmly and painlessly. And the woman who refuses her husband’s request Having a relationship in a dream, this indicates her failure financially and materially, or a failure in her life. Ibn Sirin says about intercourse with a woman in a dream, which is known as adultery, this is evidence of the abundance of knowledge that a man may have or goals and ambitions that he will achieve, and that intercourse with a woman does not Having a good reputation does not deserve praise, because it is evidence of paying off debts after some needs have passed in the man’s soul. Interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a single woman: For an unmarried girl who dreams of having sex with people of influence and great fame, this means that this girl is one of the most promising girls in life and it shows The intensity of her desire to achieve goals and reach the top. level. Classes. If she is unmarried and sees someone having sex with her in a dream, this may indicate that she will suffer from a disorder in her health or will contract a certain disease. Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried girl having sexual intercourse. In the event that an unmarried girl has a bad mood when she has sexual intercourse in a dream, this It means that this girl is hiding a secret that one of her relatives or close friends will reveal. If an unmarried girl has an illicit relationship with one of them and sees that he has intercourse with her in a dream, this is evidence of deviation, deception, and aggression from her saints. Your dream will be interpreted in seconds on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website by Google. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a strange man: A man who is married to another man without knowing him should know that the interpretation of this dream is that he only speaks with his tongue justice and truth and his actions. A woman who thinks a lot about marriage and sexual relations may dream that she is married to a strange man, because of the psychological and emotional emptiness that She suffers from it, and there is no explanation for that other than the reason we mentioned. If a married woman sees herself and a stranger having sex with her, this has many connotations, including: that there is a state of emotional dryness between her and her husband and that the relationship between them is unhealthy.

title: Dream Interpretation I dreamed that I was holding a child in my arms for an unmarried woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams I dreamed that I was carrying a child in the arms of an unmarried woman in a dream, and that the interpretation of the dream requires a lot of effort from the interpreter to interpret the vision in the correct way, as we find a difference in interpretation among scholars, as each interpreter interprets according to his knowledge and care, because children are beloved by God and a gift from Him, the dream of a little girl, and this indicates many interpretations. The good that God will obtain, and through the following lines we will interpret the dream that I dreamed of carrying a child in my arms for singles. Interpretation of dreams of carrying a child in my arms for an unmarried girl There is no doubt that the dream of children indicates the livelihood and good that the dreamer will acquire. Seeing her carrying a small child in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that this girl will receive a lot of goodness, happiness and blessings, and that there will be beautiful drinks for her. Seeing a little girl in a dream for an unmarried woman can mean that she will marry someone who appreciates and loves her very soon. This dream also indicates that the unmarried girl will achieve all her desired dreams. If the girl sees that she is caressing this child, this indicates that she will get rid of all the problems surrounding her. As for if the unmarried girl dreams that she is carrying a skinny girl in her arms and her clothes are not beautiful, this indicates the problems and poverty that will haunt her. Interpretation of seeing that I am carrying a child in a dream for a married woman When a woman gets married, her only dream is to experience motherhood and childbirth. The interpretation of a married woman's dream that she is carrying a girl in a dream indicates several interpretations represented in the following points: The dream of carrying a little girl in a dream for a married woman indicates the goodness, happiness and survival that will occur in this woman's life and that she will achieve her goals. This vision indicates to a married woman that she will become pregnant soon. If a married woman dreams that she is carrying a child in her arms and the child is beautiful and smiling, this means happiness and blessings that will be in the wife's life, in addition to the good news that the woman will receive soon. However, if this child is ugly and his clothes are dirty, this indicates sadness, distress and a lot of marital strife in the woman's life. Interpretation of seeing that I am carrying a child in my arms in a dream for a man There are many interpretations of a man's dream that he sees that he is carrying a baby girl in a dream, as this indicates many things that will happen in this man's life, such as: This vision shows the abundance of sustenance that this man will obtain. Seeing yourself carrying a little child in a dream means for a man joy, happiness and good luck that will come to him. But if a man dreams that he is carrying a little child in his arms and that this man works in the field of trade or agriculture, this means that this man will obtain financial benefits Big. But if a man dreams that he is carrying a girl and she is dirty and ugly, then this vision indicates that this man will suffer great losses and distress in life. The meaning of seeing that I am carrying a girl in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman is exposed to many pressures and fluctuations during pregnancy.

This vision for a married woman indicates that she She will become pregnant soon. If a married woman dreams that she is carrying a child in her arms and the child is beautiful and smiling, this means happiness and blessings that will be in the wife’s life, in addition to the good news that the woman will receive soon. But if this child is ugly and his clothes are dirty, this indicates sadness, anguish, and marital strife. There are many interpretations of the dream of a man who sees that he is carrying a baby girl in a dream. This indicates many things that will happen in this man’s life, such as: This vision shows the abundance of sustenance that this man will receive. To see yourself carrying a small child in a dream means for a man joy, happiness, and good luck that will come to him. But if a man dreams that he is carrying a small child in his arms and that this man works in the field of trade or agriculture, it means that this man will receive great financial benefits. However, if a man dreams that he is carrying a baby girl and she is dirty and ugly, then this vision indicates that this man will suffer great losses and distress in life. The meaning of seeing that I am carrying a baby girl in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman during pregnancy is exposed to many pressures and fluctuations.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing someone calling my name in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of hearing someone calling my name in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Dreams express their worries and from Satan, and visions express praise and goodness, and they are from God Almighty, and from the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace: “The vision is from God and the dream is from Satan.” “Supreme commentators say about the appearance of visions and dreams. In a human dream, it arises from the reflection of human feelings and thinking about many things during the day, as many see dreams as expressions of zombie desires for teeth in wakefulness. Interpretation of the dream of hearing someone calling my name in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of hearing someone calling my name in a dream according to Ibn Sirin comes Dreams in one of three ways, whether they are good visions from Almighty God, evil visions from Satan, or expressions of man's deep-seated desires during the day. We tell one person and the other presents it to you. Meanings and connotations of the dreamHearing someone calling my name in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: The dream in which I hear someone calling my name in a dream indicates success and power. The dream also symbolizes the joys and pleasures that will accompany him in his next life. It is also one of the symbols of dreams, a sign of Growth and new beginnings in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream: When I hear someone calling my name in a dream, it is a sign of fame among people. Also, one of the dream indicators is that the dreamer will receive good news in the near future, and will also reach peace, happiness, and comfort. Calling the dreamer by a name other than his own in The dream means that something bad will happen to him in his life, such as a financial, health, or family loss. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person entering the bathroom in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about hearing someone calling my name in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl has many dreams and visions, some good and some bad. Expressing a vision is permissible in Islam, for whoever is familiar with its interpretation, as it is not permissible to resort to people. Who claim to interpret dreams without relying on the correct interpretive foundations, and below we present to you the interpretation of a dream about someone hearing my name in a dream for a single woman: The dream in which I hear someone calling my name in a dream is a beautiful dream and indicates that the dreamer will receive good news in the near future. It appears Dreaming that the secret that you keep from everyone will spread to people and people will know it. At the same time, the dream is a sign that the things that you do not want people to know about your private life will be learned by people. Dream interpretation of someone calling me in a dream indicates goodness, happiness, peace, as well as dignity And honor and good reputation. Seeing someone’s name being called unpleasantly in a dream means that the person will be referred to in a bad way. To hear someone calling your name in your dream means that you will have good developments in your life and that you are loved by friends. See also: I dreamed That I breastfed a child while I am single.. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream when I hear someone calling my name in a dream about a married woman. Interpretation of a dream can only be given by someone who is good at expressing visions, and the interpreter may be wrong.

Incomplete emotional relationships or the dissolution of the engagement, whether for a girl or a young man, and in life, stumbling blocks and crises haunt the fortune teller, because they may indicate lies and deception. In a dream, an unmarried woman may indicate that she will be exposed to problems and troubles from friends and acquaintances around her. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Jumu’ah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Paraskevi in ​​a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says: Seeing reciting Surat Al-Jum’ah in a dream is a blessed vision that brings sustenance and good deeds. Also, seeing Surat Al-Jum’ah recited in a dream indicates abundant sustenance and abundant money, which will befall the dreamer, and God knows best. This vision also indicates The death of worry and anxiety, the collapse of problems and disagreements between the family, and the marriage of an unmarried girl. Also, seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Jumu’ah in a married young man’s dream indicates that he will enter a new job and earn a lot of money for them. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Paraskevi for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is reciting Surat Al-Jumu’ah This indicates her closeness to a good and upright man. This vision also indicates the collapse of her worries, the success and superiority that unites the girl, and the high status with which the girl shines. Also, seeing an unmarried woman reciting Surat Al-Jumu’ah over a dead person in a dream indicates the approach of her death. If you see an interpretation Seeing Surat Al-Jumu’ah in a dream, this means abundant sustenance and participation in a new and profitable business. Interpretation of seeing Surat Paraskevi in ​​a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Jumu’ah, this indicates the disappearance of her worries and the imminence of pregnancy, and God knows best. A married woman’s dream of reading Surat Al-Jumu’ah on Her deceased husband is evidence of illness and the need for money. This vision also indicates reaching the straight path, getting closer to God Almighty, and refraining from sins and disobedience. Interpretation of seeing Surat Paraskevi in ​​a dream for a pregnant woman. If the pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Jumu’ah in her sleep, this indicates ease Pregnancy. Also, seeing Surat Al-Jumu’ah that she recited to her dead husband indicates that she will give birth to a child like a beautiful full moon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing Surat Paraskevi in ​​a dream for a man: If a man sees in a dream that he is reciting Surat Al-Jumu’ah, this indicates the disappearance of his worries and his marriage to a good girl. Also, reciting Surah Jumu’ah on a deceased father indicates his entry into a new job and God Almighty’s meals for the poor. If a married man sees in a dream that he is reciting Surah Jumu’ah, this indicates his faith in God Almighty and the removal of disputes. title: What is the interpretation of seeing a parrot in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a parrot The parrot is considered one of the most favorite birds for many people because it is characterized by its wonderful colors and its ability to speak, imitate sounds and repeat the words it hears, so it is a distinctive bird and if it appears in a dream, it has many different meanings and interpretations as we will explain to you. Interpretation of seeing a parrot in a dream for a single girl An unmarried girl sees a colorful parrot in her dream, this vision indicates the presence of a cheerful and deceitful man in this girl's life. If the parrot in the dream speaks, this indicates that this girl will fall into many problems, crises and quarrels. Interpretation of seeing a green parrot in a dream for a single woman Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream of a green parrot means positive changes that will occur in many aspects of his life, which will be very rewarding for him. If the dreamer sees a green parrot during her sleep, this is a sign of the abundant good that she will obtain in her life from her fear of God Almighty in all her actions. If the dreamer sees a green parrot in his dream, this expresses the good events that will happen around her and that will please her very much. Seeing The dreamer in the green parrot symbolizes that she will get many things that she has been dreaming of for a long time, and this will make her very happy. If a girl sees a green parrot in her dream, this is a sign of good news that will reach her in the coming period, which will spread a lot of joy and happiness around her. Interpretation of a dream about a parrot If an unmarried girl sees that the parrot is standing in its place silently, this vision exposes this girl to separation between her and her close friends. The appearance of a green parrot in a girl's dream indicates her marriage to a man of honorable birth. Interpretation of seeing a parrot in a dream for a married woman The appearance of a parrot in a married woman's dream indicates the presence of many problems and disputes between her and her husband in the coming period. If the parrot stands silently in a married woman's dream and does not speak, this indicates the stability and family calm that this woman lives in her life. Seeing a parrot in a dream A woman who sees that she is raising a parrot in her house, this vision may indicate the presence of many problems and problems that this woman will face in her life. Buying a parrot from the market in a dream indicates an abundance of livelihood and gaining a lot of money in the period The next. A specialized Egyptian site that includes a team of senior interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site on Google. Interpretation of seeing a parrot in a dream for a divorced woman Seeing a divorced woman in a dream of a parrot shows her ability to overcome many issues that were very upsetting in her life and she will be more comfortable in the coming days. If the dreamer sees a parrot in her dream, this is a sign that she will get many things that she has been dreaming of for a long time and this will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees a parrot in his dream, this means that he will get a lot of money that will enable him to live his life the way he wants. Seeing the dreamer in her dream of a parrot

title: Interpretation of a dream about oak according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about oak according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. Oak is considered one of the most important trees used in building many things such as furniture. Under it produced blue ink. As one of the most famous fruits, seeing oak trees in a dream has many interpretations that we will discover through our article when Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi explained that this dream has visions that declare good and evil regardless of whether it is for a man or a woman. And Ibn Sirin, where the oak can indicate money, wealth and good news because it indicates to the pregnant woman the birth of a son. Interpretation of a dream about an oak tree by Al-Nabulsi The oak tree in a dream symbolizes unhappiness. The oak represents money and wealth. The oak tree is a symbol of longevity. An oak tree in a dream can mean Travel and exile. Interpretation of a dream about an oak tree by Ibn Sirin: An oak tree in a dream represents a strong and nervous person who is difficult to deal with. An oak tree in a dream can represent wealthy people. Therefore, an oak usually represents a lot of money and wealth. Roasted acorns or fried acorns are evidence of gossip and competition. An oak tree in a dream symbolizes a money collector. Interpretation of a dream about an oak for a married woman: Seeing an oak tree for a married woman means trouble and pain. An oak tree in a dream indicates that a married woman is a sign of livelihood and a lot of money. An oak tree in a dream represents a loyal and loyal husband. An oak tree indicates a married woman who dreams of a positive change in her life. An oak tree in a dream represents the good news that she will hear. Interpretation of a dream about oak for a man When a person sees an oak tree in a dream, this is a sign of the strength and courage of this person. Thus, oak leaves symbolize pain and weakness And physical fatigue in a man’s dream. Seeing a man falling into an oak tree proves the financial crisis he is going through. Seeing a man in a dream who will harvest acorns portends success in life, distinction, and prosperity. Interpretation of a dream about oak for a pregnant woman. In a pregnant woman’s dream, acorns symbolize getting rid of worries and problems during Pregnancy. The sign of an oak in a pregnancy dream indicates the presence of a male child and easy birth. But when a pregnant woman sees an oak tree in her dream, this is a sign of the birth of a girl. If a woman sees oak leaves in her dream, this means that the birth will be easy. An oak tree can foretell With the good news that a nice woman dreams of. An acorn in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates good health. Seeing a dream about acorns and collecting them in a dream. Seeing an oak tree in a dream means a long life. It also indicates miserliness, miserliness, and excessive stress. It may indicate a travel opportunity for a man or a young man. It also indicates wealth and riches for a man or woman, or the opportunity to obtain abundant money in a short period of time. It also indicates collecting money from investment projects. Roasted oak is also not good and indicates bad speech, backbiting and gossip. Seeing an oak tree in a dream for an unmarried woman is a matter Good and portends many good things. And her desires are fulfilled. The vision also indicates that he will find a bitter job

title: The most important interpretations of seeing scholars and sheikhs in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing scholars and sheikhs in a dream has many meanings and meanings, and usually indicates the dreamer’s interest in religious sciences, and getting closer to God Almighty and the Sunnah of His Messenger Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Today, through the Asrar Dream Interpretation website, we will discuss the interpretation of the dream in detail. Seeing scholars and sheikhs in a dream Seeing scholars and sheikhs in a dream is a sign of blessings and goodness that will enter the dreamer’s life. Whoever sees that a scholar or sheikh is talking about something about him, the dream here is a warning message that he has made a mistake recently and needs to review himself and take the right path. Whoever sees in a dream that an sheikh is giving him water and drinking it, it shows that his heart is connected to the faith and piety of God Almighty. Whoever dreams of kissing the hand of a sheikh is a sign of good circumstances. Seeing scholars and sheikhs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a religious scholar or sheikh in a dream shows Ibn Shirin to follow in the footsteps of the Messenger of God, Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Whoever dreams that he is talking with a sheikh about worldly matters, suggests various matters that, God willing, they will improve and be able to achieve all his goals. Seeing a religious scholar in a dream means surviving a problem or compensating for a major loss that the dreamer has suffered in the recent period. Therefore, seeing scholars and sheikhs in a dream indicates the death of distress and worry. The dreamer will live several days in which he will find endless happiness. Seeing an old religious scholar indicates the dreamer’s long life, as God Almighty grants him health and wellness, and seeing a religious scholar and a sheikh in a dream indicates that he has reached a high position at work or a high position in worship. Among the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin is that the dreamer is walking on the path that helps him reap many good deeds. Seeing scholars and sheikhs in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried woman sees in her dream a sheikh or a religious scholar, then a sign of joy enters her heart and great goodness awaits her. Seeing an unmarried girl For a group of sheikhs and religious scholars in a dream, it indicates that she will marry a young man with a high degree of good morals, as she enjoys good behavior among people, so she will find true happiness with him. Heart.Seeing scholars and sheikhs in a married woman’s dream. Seeing sheikhs and religious scholars in a married woman’s dream indicates her righteousness and seeking the satisfaction of God Almighty so that she stays away as much as possible from committing sins and transgressions. It is almost a relief that will come in her life. As for those who have suffered from a lot of debt, the dream heralds the end of that debt soon. If a married woman sees that she refuses to sit with one of the sheikhs, this means that she is going through a big problem and refuses advice from those who are wiser than her. A married woman refuses to sit with a sheikh. It indicates that she is currently far from God Almighty and has committed many transgressions and sins, so it is better to review herself before it is too late. Seeing scholars and sheikhs in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing scholars and sheikhs in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of easy childbirth. Foretells that these pains and troubles will soon die.. A cleric sitting in

title: Learn about the interpretation of the Maghrib prayer in a dream by the great interpreters and the interpretation of the Maghrib prayer in the church in a dream

preview.html: Maghrib prayer in a dream is one of the dreams that portend goodness and happiness. Prayer, as we know, is one of the pillars of Islam and a duty for every Muslim. In some visions, this dream may be evidence of comfort and a way out of crises. Maghrib prayer in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about Maghrib prayer is evidence of getting rid of problems. And getting out of all the crises that the dreamer is going through, and it is one of the most praiseworthy visions. Maghrib prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the dreamer that he completed the Maghrib prayer in a dream, this indicates achieving goals and realizing aspirations and aspirations that he has been seeking for a long time. Among the unpleasant visions is In the Maghrib prayer, if the dreamer sees that he interrupted his prayer and did not complete it, this indicates that he is deficient in worship and far from God. Also, if the sick person sees the Maghrib prayer in a dream, this indicates that his turn is approaching. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is performing the Maghrib prayer, he is trying to obtain a legal ruling and he will be blessed with it in the very near future. Maghrib prayer in a dream for Al-Ashimi. Seeing a father in a dream that he is praying the Maghrib prayer This indicates that he works hard with food to make his family happy, and God gives him from where he does not expect. Interpretation of the Maghrib prayer in a dream by Sheikh Sayyid Hamdi. Sheikh Sayyed Hamdi interprets seeing the Maghrib prayer in a dream as evidence of the end of all problems and getting rid of the worries that the dreamer has been suffering from for a long time. And also the dream of praying the Maghrib prayer in a dream. The patient also shows the severity of the disease until death. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is performing the Maghrib prayer, he will soon pay off all his debts. Enter the dream interpretation site on the Internet from Google and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. Maghrib prayer in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that she is praying Maghrib in full and with reverence, this indicates her marriage in the near future. If a girl sees in a dream that she is praying the Maghrib prayer in Ramadan, this is a vision that shows her closeness to God, observance of the rights of her religion, and performance of all the duties of the Islamic religion. Future husband. When a girl dreams that she is performing the Maghrib prayer without ablution or purity, this means that she is in a hurry to make decisions in her life that she will regret later. Praying out loud in a dream is evidence that all her prayers will be answered. Missing the Maghrib prayer in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees that she left the Maghrib prayer on time and postponed it to another time, this means that she will fall into problems and difficulties that will cause her a lot of harm. The girl suffers whether in her personal or professional life. Maghrib prayer in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman does not have children and sees in a dream that she is praying the Maghrib prayer, then this is good news that she will become pregnant soon, and the Maghrib prayer in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will become pregnant. Soon a male child..The dream of a married woman who has male children performing the Maghrib prayer is evidence that she is doing everything in her power to achieve everything that her children and family members desire..But if the married woman hears in a dream the call of prayer...
